resources.string: contact has accepted your authorization request.
contact has rejected your authorization request.
Can\'t add %1$s to your Contact List. %1$s must authorize your request to add him/her. Please enter your request below.

string.name: service_gui_REMOVE_CONTACT_TEXT
string.DIV:
Are you sure you want to remove %s
from your contact list?

resources.string: Please fill your username and password.
This user already exists on the selected network. Please choose another user or network.
Please complete the server part of your account.
We failed to create your account due to the following error:
Connection failed for the following account:\n User name: {0}, Server name: {1}.\n Please check your settings or contact your network administrator for more information.
Authentication failed for {0}. The password you entered is not valid.
Connection failed for the following account: User name: {0}, Server name: {1}. Please check your network connection or contact your network administrator for more information.

Authenticating a buddy helps ensure that the person you are talking to is who he or she claims to be. To verify the fingerprint, contact your buddy via some other authenticated channel, such as the telephone or GPG-signed email. Each of you should tell your fingerprint to the other. If everything matches up, you should indicate in the following dialog that you *have* verified the fingerprint.
verified that this is in fact the correct fingerprint for {0}.
Please enter the fingerprint you recieved from {0}.
Do you want to generate key for %s
Do you want to re-generate key for %s
{0} is contacting you from an unrecognized computer. You should authenticate {0}.
{0} has ended his/her private conversation with you; you should do the same.
You need to be connected in in order to add a contact. Please sign in to the selected provider and try again.
Failed to add contact with id: %s
The contact %s already exists in your contact list.
Server did not respond to our request adding contact with id: %s.
Failed to add contact with id: %s. Operation not supported.
Call security enabled! Tap to compare security string now or use the menu later.
Call secured. Fore more information press here.
Press here to compare security secret with your partner.
Trying to secure call. Will disconnect in

{0} can\'\'t verify the identity of the server when connecting to
{1}.

The certificate is not trusted, which means that the server\'\'s identity cannot be automatically verified.

Do you want to continue connecting?
For more information, click "Show Certificate".

{0} can\'\'t verify the identity of the server\'\'s certificate.

The certificate is not trusted, which means that the server\'\'s identity cannot
be automatically verified. Do you want to continue connecting?

For more information, click "Show Certificate".

{0} can\'\'t verify the identity of the connecting client.

The certificate is not trusted, which means that the client\'\'s identity cannot be automatically verified. Do you want to accept the connection?

For more information, click "Show Certificate".

{0} can\'\'t verify the identity of the peer {1}.

The certificate is not trusted, which means that the peer\'\'s identity cannot
be automatically verified. Do you want to continue connecting?

For more information, click "Show Certificate".

ZRTP will be advertised over signaling protocol
There will be no ZRTP advertisement

Tell others when we are writing to them
